data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements Fortran formats, therefore the name
    Fortran::Format is intuitive. The top-level namespace is analogous
    to the existing top-level namespaces C::, Java::, Tcl::, Python::,
    etc. While some other languages are listed under Language::, I think
    just using Fortran:: is not only easier and shorter but it is also
    perfectly clear.
